info.title: Bit.ly Search API
info.description: Search links receiving clicks across bitly by content, language, location, and more.

get.description: Search links receiving clicks across bitly by content, language, location, and more.

parameters.name: cities
parameters.description: show links active in this city (ordered like country-state-city, e.g. us-il-chicago).

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: restrict results to this web domain (like bitly.com).

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: which fields to return in the response (comma-separated). May be any of: domain, initial_epoch, h2, h3, site, lastindexed, keywords, last_indexed_epoch, title, initial, summaryText, content, score, summaryTitle, type, description, cities, lang, url, referrer, aggregate_link, lastseen, page, ogtitle, aggregate_link. By default, all will be returned.

parameters.name: full_domain
parameters.description: restrict results to this full web domain (like blog.bitly.com).

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: favor results in this language (two letter ISO code).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: which result to start with (defaults to 0).
